title: Maid in Isekai ≪Fantasia≫ - Novel Updates

description:
Nakamura Marina was a former guerrilla from the 'Land of Nippon.'  Following her death, a magic ritual in another world caused her soul to be placed inside a golem.
But to her, this was wonderful news.

Because Nakamura Marina had always dreamed of......>
